properties.property: [Character [Enemy Kyla] Leftward True [Sequence [[FadeOutSong 2000] [Wait 120] [PlaySong 2000 0 0.5 0 [Field DancingWithEvil]] [Wait 180] [Dialog "He told me that my beauty was why I suffered their cruelty all these years..."] [Dialog "No one ever said anything like that to me before..."] [Dialog "He said he would take me away from here..."] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Rightward] [Dialog "But how can I leave now? Everything is finally in place to exact vengeance."] [Dialog "The web is already woven..."] [Dialog "For a fleeting moment my heart's desire can be heard over my lust for vengeance..."] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Leftward] [Dialog "Vengeance and numbness is all I have ever felt..."] [Dialog "I don't how I feel anymore..."] [Dialog "How can I leave now..."] [Dialog "The web is already woven..."] [FadeOutSong 2000] [Wait 120] [ReplaceAdvent [KylaAdvent 3] [KylaAdvent 4]] [PlaySong 2000 0 0.5 0 [Castle CastlePart1]] [PlaySound 0.5 [Field ChestOpen]] [Dialog "Something unlatched..."]]] [[KylaAdvent 3]]]
